title: South Africa : number of internet users 2017 to 2023
yAxis: Number of internet users in millions
summary: In general Number of internet users in millions has rose over the Year.
Number of internet users in millions is slightly increasing from 2018 to 2021.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest Number of internet users in millions, of value 44.4 was reached at Year 2021
The lowest Number of internet users in millions, of value 36.6 was reported at Year 2018
